attributes.action: allow youth and children a democratic say in the running of the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The undersigned believe that today's political system unfairly treats youth and children, both in lack of voting rights and general treatement, and wish the Prime Minister to propose atleast one of the options below:

-Enfranchising under-18s

-Including youth elected MPs in Parliament

-Allowing youth a 'partial vote' (for instance one worth 1/2 of an adult vote)

-Giving some legislative powers to the UK Youth Parliament

-Appointing or allowing the election or youth and/or youth representatives to the reformed House of Lords

-Appointing a minister to that cabinet whose job it is to consult youth on matters that affect them.
